properties.Name: PaymentCardLineOfCredit
properties.Description: The line of credit associated with the Payment Card for the associated period.

Columns.Name: PaymentCardId
Columns.Description:
Primary Account Number (PAN) = The number that is embossed, encoded, or both, on a plastic card that identifies the issuer and the particular cardholder account.

The account number on the card, which is unique to every cardholder. The card number is used to identify the purchaser for authorization and billing purposes.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The line of credit period start date.

Columns.Name: PeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The line of credit period end date.

Columns.Name: LineOfCreditAmount
Columns.Description: The amount of the line of credit.
